title: Interpretation of seeing underwear in a dream for a divorced woman

preview.html: Today we talk about the meanings of seeing underwear in a dream for women and men in detail through your website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing underwear in a dream for a single girl A single girl sees herself buying white underwear in a dream. A metaphor for the visionary entering into a beautiful emotional relationship that translates into marriage, God willing. As for seeing the underwear completely dirty or torn in a dream for a girl. This dream is not commendable because it indicates that the dreamer is going through a long period of sadness, exhaustion and problems, God knows best. As for seeing underwear in bright colors, but the girl cannot buy it. It symbolizes that the dreamer will live a period of financial distress, God knows best. But when underwear appears in a dream for a single girl, and it was green. A metaphor for the kindness and strength that the dreamer will soon acquire. And I saw red or white underwear in a dream for a single girl and she was happy with it. The good news of marriage to a good and handsome young man soon, God knows best. As for seeing black underwear in a dream for a single girl. It indicates that the owner of the vision is suffering from injustice or envy in her life, God knows best I know. A good sign that the dreamer enjoys many good things, between money and comfort, and God knows best. As for the married woman who sees all her underwear white and elegant in a dream. It is a good sign that she lives in marital and emotional stability with her husband, and God knows best. As for the vision of a married woman in a dream, she is tearing her underwear with her hand while crying. The dream symbolizes that there is a big problem with her husband that makes her think about divorce, and God knows best. The appearance of white and small underwear in a dream for a married woman who has not given birth. Good news of the appearance of pregnancy, which makes her feel great joy, and God knows best. And if a married woman dreams that her husband gives her white or green underwear in a dream and she is satisfied with that. The dream shows that he is a person who loves her, is loyal to her, and takes care of her. But if he gives her black or red underwear in a dream. Bad vision; Because it symbolizes his betrayal of her, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing underwear in a dream about a man and its meaning When a man dreams that he is looking in a dream at the white underwear in the closet. It symbolizes the abundant good that comes to the dreamer without misery or fatigue. It may be an inheritance, and God knows best. The dream indicates that the dreamer is entering a period of life full of joy, happiness and goodness, and God knows best. As for the man who sees underwear in a dream, they are dirty in a dream. A sign that he will face many problems at work, and God knows best. But in the case of seeing black and torn underwear in a man's dream

title: Interpretation of seeing bees in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing bees in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq: Bees are insects that play an important role in our lives. They work to produce delicious honey. There are many species, estimated at about 20,000 species, distributed over many countries on the planet. Bees also teach us cooperation so that you can work in teams to make many types of delicious honey. Today and until today we will talk about the interpretation of seeing bees in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. What are the interpretations of this dream follow us. Interpretation of seeing bees in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq in general: Seeing bees in a dream shows many Among the interpretations, the most important of them are: The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing bees in the house as a door to livelihood, and it also indicates good children. Also, seeing bees in a dream indicates the success of this person in his scientific and professional life. Also, if someone dreams of killing bees, And that person works in the field of agriculture and agriculture, then this means that he is exposed to some problems, and God knows best. If a person dreams of seeing a lot of bees and he is about to enter into a new project, then this vision indicates good news of the success of this project, and God knows best. If the person dreams of seeing a hive Bees in a dream, it means that he lives in a happy home. If one dreams of bees in general, this indicates a lot of good and abundant money. Seeing a beehive in a married man’s dream may mean that his wife will give birth only to males. Whoever sees it in a dream attacks him. Bees, but he succeeded in escaping from them, this indicates that in the near future he will achieve success at the work level. Whoever sees in his dream that bees are coming out of his mouth, this indicates that he is a person of good speech and good speech. If an unmarried young man dreams that bees attack him, this It means that he will get married soon. As for the interpretation of a bee attack in a married man’s dream, it indicates a lot of good. Interpretation of a dream about being chased by bees in a dream: If a person dreams in a dream that he is being chased by bees and manages to escape from them, this indicates his success in his academic and professional life. Interpretation of the vision Bees in a dream Sadiq Imam for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams of seeing bees and watching them and how they work, this indicates that the dreaming girl is a practical girl who does not waste her time on trivial matters. If an unmarried girl dreams that there are bees in her bedroom and that her country is getting up This indicates the presence of bad friends surrounding her and she must be careful of them and stay away from them. As for an unmarried girl’s dream that she takes honey from the bees and keeps it in a jar, this indicates that this girl is waiting for her life full of happiness, kindness and joy, and perhaps this dream indicates the imminence of marriage. Interpretation of seeing bees in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she is tending a beehive and is afraid of them, this means that this woman is waiting for her with very good and abundant food and she will be happy with her offspring, then they will be fair and successful. If a married woman dreams of being stung by bees, this means that she has been cured of a disease in her body, and God knows best. But if a married woman

title: Interpretation of cutting hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of cutting hair in a dream. Dreams are images and fantasies that come to the sleeper’s mind, some of which are familiar and others are strange. For example, it comes to the mind to know their interpretation or what they mean. Such thoughts in a dream, in this article we will try to focus on the meaning of dreams and what connotations dreams carry. A dream A dream is a series of images, thoughts, feelings and sensations that usually occur involuntarily in the mind during certain stages of sleep, and the true meaning of dreams cannot be understood, Although it has been the focus of scientific, philosophical and religious interest. Along. date. As for dream interpretation, it is an attempt to extract the meaning of dreams and search for the message behind them, and the scientific study of dreams is called psychoanalysis through dreams. Dreams occur primarily in rapid eye movement (REM) sleep, when brain activity is high and its activity is similar to its activity when awake, and REM sleep is detected by continuous eye movements during sleep. Now that we know the scientific meaning of dreams, what is the interpretation of a dream about cutting hair. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hairDreams have many meanings and in psychology, their interpretations can be used to try to determine the feelings and stage in which a person is. To know the interpretation of the dream of cutting, we must first note that hair plays a big role in our lives, because it represents who you are or what you show to others. Part of a dream can illustrate many issues related to a person's mental image of themselves. Here are some common interpretations of cutting hair in a dream: The interpretation of a B-cut may indicate that a cycle in your life has ended and a new cycle is about to begin. To dream that you are cutting someone else's hair indicates that there is something you need to deal with with this person You may want to resolve the dispute that has arisen between you or withdraw from your relationship with him. Dreaming of showing another person cutting hair means that the dreamer wants to help this person, but you are unable to do so. Cutting another person’s hair could be a sign of a visual feeling that their power has It was taken away from them, or they may be stressed at work or feel that they have a problem that needs to be solved. If the hair in the dream is healthy and shiny, this is a positive sign. If the hair is damaged. This means that the fortuneteller needs to spend some time practicing some self-care at home. A girl’s dream about cutting her hair may be related to her desire to try short hair, but she is hesitant about it. Interpretation of a dream about cutting and styling hair in Islamic booksAfter interpreting dream hair styles in science, Here are some interpretations in Islamic dream interpretation books: Good combing of one’s hair in a dream means faith and fulfillment of a promise. For someone who lacks faith, cutting one’s hair or cutting one’s hair in a dream means wasting money. If shortening one’s hair in general means knowledge and guidance. Hairstyle A woman's hair in a dream means divorce. Beautiful hair in a dream represents a person of good character. Hair in a dream also means that you feel bad.

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving a robe in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about giving a robe in a dream If you want to know the interpretation of a dream about giving a robe in a dream, there is a large number of evidence and interpretations of dreams and we find that in general scholars and diligent people search for interpretations and the site managers do not interfere in the interpretations, but rather convey the scholars’ interpretations.Interpretation Dreaming of giving a robe in a dream Dreaming of a gift of robes in a dream may indicate the abundance of goodness and tremendous supply that comes to the dreamer in those days, thanks to God. If one sees that he received a robe in a dream as a gift, this may indicate good circumstances and positive changes occurring in his life During this time, thanks to God. If a person sees that he received a robe as a gift in a dream, this may mean that he will avoid the material losses that he may suffer in the coming period, thanks to God. And if he sees robes in a dream, it may indicate his closeness to God Almighty and his repentance from sins and misdeeds. Which he committed in the previous period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about gifting a box of makeup in a dream: Giving a box of makeup as a gift in a dream may indicate the great bond that exists between that person during those days. If a girl sees that her fiancé gave her a box of makeup in a dream, this may indicate his intense love For her, praise be to God. If a girl sees that she received a box of makeup as a gift in a dream, this may indicate a lot of goodness for her in the coming days, and God knows best. Dreaming of receiving a box of makeup as a gift in a dream may indicate positive changes that will happen to the dreamer in those days. Days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a gift to the deceased in a dream: Giving a gift to the deceased in a dream may indicate changes that occur to the dreamer in his life during those days. Anyone who dreams that the dead give him a gift in a dream may indicate a loss or harm that the dreamer may suffer in his life. And God knows best. In the case of a vision in which the deceased is given a gift and the deceased rejects it in the dream, this may indicate a large number of sins in order for the dreamer to ask for forgiveness and pray for mercy upon him. A dream about giving food to the dead in a dream may indicate some financial crises that the dreamer may face in his life and he must Asking God for help. Interpretation of a dream about giving a gift to my friend in a dream: Giving a gift to a friend in a dream may indicate the closeness that exists between you during this time, and God knows best. A person’s dream that he gave a gift to his friend may indicate the good luck that the person enjoys during those days, thanks to God. Dreaming of giving a gift to a friend in a dream may indicate happy events that will come to him during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams for the gift of the sweetness of birth in a dream. Receiving the sweetness of the Prophet’s birthday as a gift in a dream may be good news for visions during this time. In the event that one sees that he has received Birthday candy as a gift in a dream, this may indicate the happiness that will come to him in those days thanks to God. Dreaming of a gift of birthday sweets in a dream may indicate the broadest lifestyle that the person with the vision can achieve in his life during this period.

title: Interpretation of cheese in a dream for a single woman with different types of cheese with the most accurate interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of cheese in a dream for a single woman We see you in our article today Interpretation of cheese in a dream for a single woman Cheese is one of the basic foods that include breakfast and dinner and is characterized by its high nutritional value due to its containing many important nutrients for health and the human body, and according to its data and the condition of its owner, the interpretation differs according to the condition of the cheese, its color, and whether it is fresh or spoiled. Interpretation of a single woman's dream of cheese Cheese in the dream of an unmarried girl symbolizes that her life is stable, happy and free of problems. If an unmarried girl dreams that she ate a piece of cheese. Her vision indicates that she got money without effort or from an unknown source. When an unmarried girl sees a large amount of cheese in her dream and cannot eat it. This means that she will face problems in the near future and this may be due to a lack of money. An unmarried girl's dream of eating spoiled cheese indicates her financial loss, anxiety and sorrows. It is a promising vision for a single girl to see herself eating a large amount of cheese with someone and be happy. As this vision symbolizes the imminent marriage of the dreamer. Whoever sees in her dream that she is eating soft cheese. Show her vision that she is loved by others and that there are many who propose to marry her. If the dreamer is still studying; The vision heralds her success and excellence in her studies. This vision also indicates that the dreamer will live in prosperity and happiness with her future husband. In general, the dream of an unmarried woman eating soft cheese symbolizes the achievement of what the dreamer wants, whether it is a good husband, financial independence, assuming important positions, or instead of the pains he suffered in the previous period. While hard cheese symbolizes the dreamer's failure to complete the tasks assigned to him or hearing sad news. As for the dream of selling cheese in a dream for a single woman, this indicates that the dreamer loves shopping and wants to make positive changes in her life. White cheese in a dream for a single woman Many white cheeses in the dream of an unmarried girl symbolize that the dreamer will get a lot of good as a result of the work he will do. The appearance of spoiled white cheese in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates that the dreamer does not have his job and therefore will not be able to complete some of the tasks required of him. One of the visions that have been well interpreted is the dream of an unmarried girl that she is eating fresh white cheese. This vision indicates that God Almighty will bless the dreamer with stability at home and work, and with an abundance of money and good luck. This vision may indicate the dreamer's imminent marriage to a wealthy man with a sense of humor. But if the cheese that the fortune teller ate in her dream was not fresh. This means that she will go through some crises and will hear sad news that will affect her. Or this vision may indicate that its owner will marry an evil man, so she should be careful when choosing. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a black scorpion for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a black scorpion for a single woman: A black scorpion is one of the things that terrifies people when they see it in real life because of the poison it contains and can end a person’s life within minutes. It is one of the signs of evil that one can take as a symbol of everything that one hates, and likewise seeing it in a dream with an unmarried woman may not bear her kindness. Interpretation of a dream of a black scorpion for a single woman by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream of a black scorpion for a single womanA black scorpion in a dream is almost a bad thing that will happen to a person In his life, there are many images of his presence in a person’s dreams, but most of the cases and circumstances in which he sees a black scorpion are among the signs of the presence of evil. If watching this dream is an unmarried girl, then the first indication that the dream of a black scorpion is carrying her is that there is a man He is good at talking to her and wants the opposite of what she seems. It is a warning to the viewer to stay away from this person because of the harm and damage he wants. If an unmarried girl is engaged to a man whom she did not know before entering into the engagement, then seeing a black scorpion in a dream, if it is associated with a feeling of fear and anxiety, indicates that this suitor is not good for her and Warning her against continuing her relationship with him.Interpretation of a dream about a black scorpion for a single woman, according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of an unmarried girl who sees a scorpion is often an indication that there is someone hiding inside her who wants to harm her, and it does not necessarily have to be a man. It may be a friend or relative who shows affection to the fortuneteller and hides something else in her heart. But if the one who sees this dream is a student of knowledge, then its interpretation in this case may be jealousy and hatred for others around her as a result of her superiority over them. If there are problems with the father’s or mother’s family , including uncles and close friends of the visionary, this dream in this dream is a symbol of their presence in her life, causing her harm and psychological pressure. Also, a black scorpion in an unmarried woman’s dream can be a pause in the situation and failure of life issues that she requires to move forward Correctly. An Egyptian website, the largest website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website on Google and get the correct interpretations. I dreamed of a black scorpion for a single woman, in the event that an unmarried girl dreams of a black scorpion in a dream, and it actually passes by. During difficult periods for her and she is unable to overcome the crises that she is exposed to during them, the black scorpion in her dream symbolizes these crises and difficulties and the negative effects they cause on insight. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about shaving the beard of Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: The interpretation of the dream of shaving the beard varies whether the person is actually bearded or not, and it also has many meanings that differ from each other depending on the social status of the viewer and according to the words of the commentators. We learn about everything that was said about it through our topic today, so continue reading to find out the details. Interpretation of the dream of shaving the beard by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation Dream of shaving a beard? If the dreamer feels some stress or tension in his real life, or his debts increase and he does not know where to find the money to pay them, this means that he will soon overcome them and alimony will come to him. From where he does not know, except that he must rely on God and take the reasons. Shaving the beard in a dream If the dreamer is sick, this means that his pain will end and he will recover very soon. Some scholars have said that the fact that the beard is a confirmed Sunnah from the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, this means That shaving is loss and deficiency from God, and that if the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace. Was he bearded in reality and shaved in the dream, then there is a certain temptation in which he will be exposed and he will follow temptation, abandoning the straight path and turning away from it. A long beard in a dream means sustenance, abundance of wealth, health and well-being, and if shaved it means illness, weakness and frailty according to some. We still disagree among scholars. Some of them said: If the beard in a dream is long, and he begins shaving it, then he will find someone to help him in obedience and good deeds away from hypocrisy and flattery. A pregnant woman who sees her husband shaving his beard and completely changing his appearance is considered a sign that she is about to give birth and get rid of all the pain and problems of pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about shaving a beard by Ibn Sirin: A married man shaving his beard is evidence that he and his wife are suffering from problems that become more severe over time and may reach the point of separation if one of the believers does not intervene between them to resolve these differences. But if he shaves it in his sleep due to a skin disease or something like that, then it In fact, he is exposed to some problems at work that may cause him to lose his job and have to find someone to feed him and support his work. Family. If he shaved part of it and left the rest in an unnatural appearance for the person, this means that he sees a loss in his money or in his children, if he is married and has children and he must beware of what awaits him in a difficult period of his life. Interpretation of a dream about shaving Imam Al-Sadiq’s beard. Imam Al-Sadiq said that if The girl saw a man shaving his beard, then this is good news for her that she will marry a young man with good morals and religion who will do his best to provide her with a decent wife. As for shaving in a young man’s dream, it is evidence of lack of religion and negligence in performing duties and what God has commanded him to do. He also said that if a man of good faith is seen Work and money while he cuts his beard without shaving it, this indicates a setback in trade that will end soon and will end without incurring many losses. But if the dreamer is going through great financial hardship and is looking for help and support to help him overcome it, then he may become good in the future as a result of his work and diligence, and his life will develop. For the better. Your dream will find its interpretation in seconds. Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. Interpretation of a dream about shaving a beard for a woman

title: Interpretation of seeing ducks in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing ducklings in a dream Seeing ducklings in a dream We will learn in the lines of this article from a different site about the interpretation of seeing ducklings in a dream and what are the meanings and symbols that this vision carries for the fortune teller. The meaning of the dream when you see ducks in a dream Many dream interpreters see in the interpretation of seeing ducks in a dream that this vision brings a lot of good news and food to the sleeper. If the dreamer sees a small green duck in his dream, this often symbolizes the approaching marriage, whether for a young man or a girl. Also, seeing a large group of green ducks indicates that you will hear happy news in the coming period. This dream is also interpreted as the arrival of many good things to the dreamer, especially if you like the shape of the duck in the dream. Seeing the slaughter of ducks in a dream interprets the coming good for the sleeper. Seeing cooked or slaughtered ducks is also good news and a commendable vision for the sleeper. Seeing ducks and their yellow color in a dream means that the dreamer will get a lot of sustenance and good luck. Seeing ducklings in a dream moving very quickly indicates great and positive changes in the dreamer's life. When you see ducklings floating on the water in a dream, this indicates wealth and many good things that come to the dreamer. Thus, seeing ducks in a dream is a sign of kindness and great blessings for the one who sees this vision. Interpretation of a dream about seeing ducks in a dream for a single woman Seeing ducklings in a dream is one of the commendable dreams for an unmarried girl and a sign of abundance of goodness for the dreamer. When a single girl sees herself in a dream feeding yellow ducklings, this means that she will be able to achieve her desires and goals. Seeing yellow ducks in a dream about a single girl floating on the water is interpreted as this girl will get a good husband with a good personality and debts and will live happily with him, God willing. This vision can also be interpreted by the dreamer getting a good job opportunity or a big promotion at work. As for seeing white ducklings in a woman's dream Unmarried, this is evidence of the purity of that girl's heart and soul. While the unmarried woman who sees yellow ducklings in her house in a dream symbolizes the happiness of the coming days for that girl's family. As for seeing yellow and white ducklings together in one dream, it is a happy vision and good news for earning a lot of money, except for the cover of God Almighty. And when an unmarried woman sees ducklings running quickly in a dream, this is interpreted through the positive changes that occur in the dreamer in the next life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing ducks in a dream for a married woman Seeing ducks in a dream for a married woman, if the color of these ducks is yellow, this means that her husband loves her very much and works hard to maintain his home and family. When a married woman sees in a dream someone giving her yellow ducklings, this portends that she will give birth soon, God willing. While seeing white ducklings in a married dream indicates the death of sadness and distress from the dreamer's life and

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person as hungry in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead person hungry in a dream When searching for an interpretation of seeing a dead person hungry in a dream, it is one of the most disturbing dreams, so they are looking for an interpretation of this dream, but the reader must also prohibit the absolute. Disbelief because it is the diligence of some scholars who seek to reach the truth. To be influenced, in addition to the fact that the site and its administrators have nothing to do with interpretations. Interpretation of seeing a dead person as being hungry in a dream. Anyone who sees in a dream that the deceased is eating food indicates a financial crisis that the dreamer will face in his life. During those days, the dream of a dead person being hungry in a dream may indicate that the deceased is in need of alms at this time, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing the dead person wanted to eat and was very hungry, which may indicate the dead person’s need to pray at that time, and God knows best. Request The dead person gave the dreamer food and was very hungry, which may indicate worries and problems that the dreamer may face in his life in the coming period, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the dead asking for forgiveness from those living in a dream. Whoever saw in a dream that the dead person asked him to forgive him, it is possible that he needed charity. At that time, and God knows best. The living asking the dead for forgiveness may indicate his need for supplication in those days. Anyone who sees in a dream that the deceased was asking the living to forgive him may indicate the difficulties that the dreamer may face in his life in that regard. Time, and he must ask for God’s help. Dreaming of a dead person asking forgiveness from a living person may indicate changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a deceased person buying new clothes for himself in a dream. Seeing a deceased person buying new clothes in a dream may indicate covering Which the dreamer acquires during this period, thanks to God. A dream of a deceased who presents to the dreamer with new clothes may indicate the abundance of money that the dreamer obtains at that time, thanks to God. If the deceased saw that the deceased was buying new clothes, this may indicate the blessings that he enjoyed. And God knows best. Seeing yourself buying new clothes in a dream may indicate good things to come and happiness that will come to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about burying the dead inside the house in a dream: In the event that a person sees the deceased buried inside the house, this can indicate To the dreamer traveling or working far away from his family. Dreaming of burying the dead inside the house in a dream may indicate a wedding date or upcoming joy for the people of the house, thanks to God. If you see in a dream burying the deceased inside the house and the people of the house are crying, this may indicate changes that It occurs in the lives of the people of the house at that time and they have to ask for God's help. . If a person sees burying the dead inside the house in a dream, this may indicate the problems that the people of the house faced at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the deceased sad and crying in a dream. It is possible that seeing the deceased is sad and crying may indicate worries and problems that the dreamer is facing. In his life during these thousand

title: Interpretation of seeing breastfeeding in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing breastfeeding in a dream? Interpretation of seeing breastfeeding in a dream It is interpreted with double meanings and connotations, including negative and positive, according to the context of the dream, and knowledge of all its symbols and the elements it contains. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Breastfeeding in a dream. Interpretation Breastfeeding in a dream, according to Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation, indicates the benefits and money that the dreamer obtains from breastfeeding and vice versa, that is, if the dreamer sees someone breastfeeding with milk, then the dream indicates that. He obtains money and many benefits from the dreamer. A woman who dreams of a man breastfeeding her against her will, and taking a lot of money from her, may be exposed to theft or blackmail. Al-Nabulsi said that the dreamer who breastfeeds a person in a dream will be sad and suffer from financial, health, and emotional concerns, depending on the nature of his life. Al-Nabulsi continued his interpretation of the symbol of breastfeeding, and said that if the dreamer breastfeeds someone or sees someone breastfeeding him in a dream, then the dream in both cases symbolizes mood swings and a feeling of pessimism and discomfort. It is known that breastfeeding is through the breast, but if the dreamer is breastfeeding From the hand, leg, or other than the breast, he desires to achieve unattainable ambitions, and the jurists said that he will never achieve them. . In this case, the person must think of new goals and aspirations that can be easily achieved in order to reach them easily and smoothly. If the dreamer breastfeeds in a dream from his mother’s breast and continues to drink milk until he is satisfied, then if he is thirsty for money and a high standard of living, the vision foretells his achievement. The abundance of money in his life, and the vision symbolizes the status and reputation that he will gain, God willing. Breastfeeding in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin did not like the symbol of breastfeeding in a dream and said that it indicates anxiety and worry. A divorced woman if she dreams that she is breastfeeding a child in her dream even though in reality she has not given birth. If an unmarried woman sees someone breastfeeding, this is evidence of her unhappiness. She wants to do many things in her life, and there are those who disturb her or take away her freedom and hinder her steps and progress. she has. And most likely, the person who disturbs her peace in her life will be someone who has authority over her, such as a father or brother. Ibn Sirin said that the only exceptional case in which the symbol of breastfeeding is interpreted well and healthily is the vision of a pregnant woman breastfeeding a child, but there are many elements And the symbols that must be present in the dream before this happens. It indicates the completion of pregnancy and childbirth and is as follows: Whether or not: The child you nursed in the dream must be in good health, with a round body and a beautiful shape. Second: It is preferable for the child to be toothless, because if he breastfed a child who has many teeth in his mouth, then the dream here indicates To worry and anxiety. Third: If you are breastfeeding a child with blood or turbid water, then the dream is very dirty, and it is better to breastfeed him with milk or anything else useful, such as white honey. Interpretation of breastfeeding in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq said: Breastfeeding is pregnancy if it becomes pregnant.
